title: Whirlpool

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Throw visitors in a whirlpool and take abilities found in the wreckage.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can make a whirlpool, and any visitors to you and the players next to you (as found in the player list) will be thrown in the whirlpool. You will also be in the whirlpool.
- If you are player 6 and player 7 is dead, visitors to player 8 go in the whirlpool.
- Anyone in the whirlpool will use their ability on ***everyone*** in the whirlpool (including you). If they have limited uses of an ability, they will only use one charge.
- You cannot be killed by an ability used on you due to a whirlpool.
- You will get 1 use of the ability of every person in the whirlpool.
- If you have abilities to use, you will no longer make a whirlpool, and instead use one of your abilities.
- Once you use (# of killing abilities) + 1 ability found in the whirlpool, you can choose during the day to lose the abilities to make another whirlpool. You can choose every day this condition has been met.
- Once you use all abilities, you will be able to make a whirlpool the next day.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- In the final 5, you will be able to lose any stored abilities you have every day, and will instead be able to do a powerful attack each night.
- You cannot make a whirlpool if there are 5 or less players.
- Roleblock Immunity.
